title: Hyoscine butylbromide
summary: Hyoscine butylbromide, also known as scopolamine butylbromide[3] and sold under the brandname Buscopan among others,[4] is an anticholinergic medication used to treat crampy abdominal pain, esophageal spasms, renal colic, and bladder spasms.[5][6] It is also used to improve respiratory secretions at the end of life.[7] Hyoscine butylbromide can be taken by mouth, injection into a muscle, or into a vein.[4]
